titles.title: A resolution commending the community of Chase, Maryland for its assistance to the rescue workers and the survivors of the Amtrak train accident of January 4, 1987.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Commends the community of Chase, Maryland, for its assistance to the rescue workers and passengers of the Amtrak train accident of January 4, 1987.
